channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Sam's Blog

item.title: Using Blogdown to start a blog
item.description: Using R Blogdown to start a Blog Hello, World! This is my first blog post. This blog is built using the R Blogdown package. The Blogdown book was used to learn how to use the package. Blogdown makes it very easy for R programmers to build a personal website for a portfolio and/or blog. If you’re an avid R user and don’t have a personal website or blog, you need to check out Yihui’s book (see link above)!
